MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath, affecting properties in Viewfield Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.52pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Sunnyside Place substation to investigate a blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.59pm on Friday 23rd October 2020.
